alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:17PM CDT until April 16 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Yazoo and Madison Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Thousands of acres of agricultural land are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.9 feet and cresting. - Forecast...The river is currently cresting and will begin falling through the end of the week. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Black River West 15.0 18.9 Tue 6 pm CDT 18.6 18.1 17.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
